description.p: APX is a QIX clone with minor differences in gameplay from the original.

ul.li: Use arrow keys to move around the perimeter of square, hold down Space or Shift to cut into the area. Connect back to perimeter to claim the area.
Your objective is to claim 75% or more to proceed to the next level
Claiming with Shift key will be slower but give you double the points.
For every claimed full percent over 75% you get extra 1000 points.
